```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

library(readr)
data <- read_csv("data/CS201.Work")


```

# Page 1 hashtag space

## Row 1

```{r, warning=FAlSE}

p1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

## Row 2 {tablet=""}

```{r}
#| title: Bar Chart


p2 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
them(axis.title.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = ))

ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r}
#| title: Tab 2

starwars <- starwars %>%
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr:kabel(starwars)

```
